translation.en: [Joe] Well, hello there.
translation.it: Però... ciao.

translation.en: Who are you?

translation.en: Based on your vibe, a student.

translation.en: Your blouse is loose.

translation.en: You're not here to be ogled, but those bracelets, they jangle.

translation.en: You like a little attention.

translation.en: Okay, I bite.

translation.en: You search the books. Fiction, "F" through "K."

translation.en: Now...

translation.en: Hmm, you're not the standard insecure nymph hunting for Faulkner you'll never finish.

translation.en: Too sun-kissed for Stephen King.

translation.en: Who will you buy?

translation.en: [Beck gasps] Sorry.

translation.en: and you murmur your first word to me.
translation.it: e mi sussurri la tua prima parola.

translation.en: Hello.

translation.en: Do you work here?

translation.en: Guilty.

translation.en: It's a good choice.

translation.en: Hmm, I feel weirdly validated.

translation.en: [chuckles] Follow me.

translation.en: She's gonna be in here.

translation.en: "Celebrity authors"? I thought Fox was pretty obscure.

translation.en: You're not expected to know that.

translation.en: That's sad.

translation.en: and not because they wanna be moved or changed in some way.

translation.en: What time do you think we'll meet?

translation.en: No offense, we discussed this.
translation.it: Senza offesa, ma ne abbiamo parlato.

translation.en: It's best if the product has one clear face at the beginning.
translation.it: È meglio che il prodotto abbia un volto unico all'inizio.

translation.en: That's just more me.
translation.it: Sono più adatto io.

translation.en: [Joe] Okay, the spine is sewn.
translation.it: Ok, il dorso è cucito.

translation.en: So you take this, pull it as tight as you can, that way.
translation.it: Ora prendi questo e tira più forte che puoi.

translation.en: Yeah. That's it.
translation.it: Sì, così.

translation.en: The glue is set. We've applied the binder.
translation.it: La colla è pronta. Abbiamo applicato la copertina.

translation.en: Now...
translation.it: Ora...

translation.en: you gotta be precise, and use exactly the force needed.
translation.it: ...devi essere preciso e usare esattamente la forza richiesta.

translation.en: Hey!
translation.it: Ehi!

translation.en: Hey, man. Jeff. Nice to meet you, man.
translation.it: Ciao. Jeff. Piacere.

translation.en: Nice to meet you, too. Have you been here before?
translation.it: Piacere mio. Sei mai stato qui?

translation.en: It's a... Not a lot of people know about it yet.
translation.it: Non lo conoscono ancora in molti.

translation.en: It's an incredible after-hours. Very exclusive.
translation.it: È un club incredibile. Molto esclusivo.

translation.en: Yeah, I've been here a couple of times.
translation.it: Ci sono stato un paio di volte.

translation.en: -Yeah? -Hmm.
translation.it: Sì?

translation.en: Oh. Well, good.
translation.it: Bene.

translation.en: So you'll feel right at home, then.
translation.it: Allora ti sentirai a casa.

translation.en: Please, after you.
translation.it: Prego, dopo di te.

translation.en: All right.
translation.it: Ok.

translation.en: It's just down. To the left.
translation.it: Scendi le scale e poi a sinistra.

translation.en: Hey, man, I'm thinking maybe...
translation.it: Ehi, credo che forse...

translation.en: [Joe] It's 2:00 p.m. when the door chimes, and I'm ready.
translation.it: Sono le 14:00 quando la porta si apre, e sono pronto.

translation.en: You told your girlfriends you'd come by. I know this because I have your phone.
translation.it: Hai detto alle amiche che saresti passata. Lo so perché ho il tuo cellulare.

translation.en: -I'll be back. -[Joe] Okay.
translation.it: - Torno subito. - Ok.

translation.en: Hey.
translation.it: Ciao.

translation.en: Remember me? From almost dying on the train tracks? [chuckles]
translation.it: Ti ricordi di me? Sono quasi morta sui binari.

translation.en: Uh, it rings a bell. Hang on. Hang on.
translation.it: Mi ricorda qualcosa. Aspetta.

translation.en: I wanted to say thank you.
translation.it: Volevo ringraziarti.

translation.en: No. You already did that.
translation.it: L'hai già fatto.

translation.en: Well, uh, thanks again. [chuckles]
translation.it: Beh, grazie di nuovo.

translation.en: And I'm sorry for, uh, running off the other night.
translation.it: E mi dispiace per essere scappata l'altra sera.

translation.en: -You had a guest. -Hardly.
translation.it: - Avevi un ospite. - Non direi.

translation.en: So, I got you a present.
translation.it: Ti ho preso un regalo.

translation.en: No, please. You don't have to get me anything.
translation.it: No, ti prego. Non devi.

translation.en: Shut up and just look at it.
translation.it: Sta' zitto e guarda.

translation.en: "Engine, engine number nine On the New York transit line
translation.it: "Locomotiva numero nove Sulla linea di transito di New York

translation.en: If your girl falls on the track Pick her up, pick her up, pick her up"
translation.it: Se la tua ragazza cade sui binari Tirala su"

translation.en: [Joe] We already have in-jokes.
translation.it: Siamo già alle battute solo nostre.

translation.en: So...
translation.it: Allora...

translation.en: anyway, that. And I better--
translation.it: Ecco qua. È meglio se...

translation.en: Maybe if you're not too busy, we could get a drink sometime?
translation.it: Magari, se non sei troppo impegnata, potremmo bere qualcosa insieme?

translation.en: Sure.
translation.it: Certo.

translation.en: Ugh. But I still can't find my phone.
translation.it: Ma non ho ancora trovato il cellulare.

translation.en: I know. E-mail.
translation.it: Lo so. E-mail.

translation.en: That's right.
translation.it: Esatto.

translation.en: See ya, Joe.
translation.it: Ci vediamo, Joe.

translation.en: See you soon, Beck.
translation.it: A presto, Beck.

translation.en: Well played, sir.
translation.it: Bella mossa, amico mio.

translation.en: Well played.
translation.it: Bella mossa.

translation.en: [Joe] I'm not always right. I'm human. I make mistakes.
translation.it: Non ho sempre ragione. Sono umano. Faccio errori.

translation.en: You'll see.
translation.it: Vedrete.

translation.en: I have to check on a shipment downstairs.
translation.it: Devo controllare una spedizione di sotto.

translation.en: -Can you watch the register? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Puoi stare alla cassa? - Sì.

translation.en: [Joe] Hell, maybe I'm just a fool in love...
translation.it: Forse sono solo un folle innamorato...

translation.en: but I'm right about you,
translation.it: ...ma ho ragione su di te

translation.en: and I'm going to help you get the life you deserve, Beck.
translation.it: e ti aiuterò ad avere la vita che meriti, Beck.

translation.en: Please.
translation.it: Ti prego.

translation.en: Whatever you think I did, you got the wrong guy.
translation.it: Qualunque cosa credi che abbia fatto, hai preso l'uomo sbagliato.

translation.en: I don't.
translation.it: Non è vero.
